message:
Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a significant addition to your collection or business. Given its unique qualities and rarity, I understand its worth to you might be $1,000,000. Considering its true worth and the effort put into its creation, I am offering you the chance to own it for $1,200,000.

This price reflects my desire to ensure that the product finds a home where it will be appreciated and utilized to its full potential. Should you choose to accept this offer, I am confident it will exceed your expectations and provide substantial value to you.

Please let me know if you require any further information or if there's anything else I can assist you with in making your decision. I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional product to your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice
